Hello!

My name is Devin Padrón. I was born in New Jersey, raised in Puerto Rico, and currently working as a mechanical design engineer in Florida. In my role, I use various software tools to design mechanical components and systems for spacecraft and other applications.

Outside of work, I greatly enjoy learning about computer science and related topics. I have been teaching myself programming in my free time, focusing mainly on languages including Python, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. I have worked on projects such as building this website, automation scripts, and web-based games.

Thank you for taking the time to visit my page. If you’d like to connect, feel free to reach out to me through LinkedIn or Twitter.
